## Bio 
Padraig is a board certified Veterinarian in preventive medicine (ACVPM) and a graduate student in Animal Biology at the University of California, Davis.  
His research thesis is focused on mathematical modeling and dairy cow nutrition. This work emphasizes the distribution of dry matter intake across cow populations, and creating predictive models of feed requirements to increase the precision of cow group diet formulation.
